DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study ass follow-up subject receive AdGVVEGF121cDNA IRB protocol # 0794-894 entitle `` Phase I Study Direct Administration Replication Deficient Adenovirus Vector ( AdGVVEGF121.10 ) Containing VEGF121 cDNA Ischemic Myocardium Individuals Diffuse Coronary Artery Disease '' IRB protocol # 0297-693 entitle `` Phase I Study Direct Administration Replication Deficient Adenovirus Vector ( AdGVVEGF121.10 ) Containing VEGF121 cDNA Ischemic Myocardium Individuals Diffuse Coronary Artery Disease Via Minimally Invasive Surgery '' .
DOC.brief_title: Post Ten Year Follow Assessment Phase I Trial Angiogenic Gene Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: A research coordinator Weill Cornell Medical College survey medical record 31 subject , obtain contact information living subject . Living subject call research coordinator Stony Brook University Medical Center invite participate current follow-up study , entail full medical chart review . If potential subject interested , he/she invite Stony Brook University Medical Center Dr. Rosengart designate co-investigator conduct informed consent process . However , subject unable travel Stony Brook University Medical Center mail consent form . Those consent participate compile medical record send Stony Brook University Medical Center . The research coordinator Stony Brook conduct chart review order collect information regard subject 's medication , evaluation surgical history past 10 year . This information include cardiac health evaluation 99mTc-sestamibi SPECT , treadmill exercise tolerance test cardiac specific blood test . These parameter compare evaluation do baseline evaluation do subject 's last visit participant either Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) protocol # 0794-894 # 0297-693 .
